name: Phantasy Star Online: Episode I & II Plus
overview: The Darkness has returned. The planet Ragol is once again in peril. New character classes and weapons are at you disposal, but only your skills as a Hunter will keep you alive. Brave the depths of evil alone, or enlist the aid of three heroes is split-screen play. Once you have conquered the Darkness, go online and take your experience to the next level. However you choose to play, know this: Evil has returned to Ragol, and a new adventure awaits.
